verses.name: Psalms 55:12
verses.text: For it was not an enemy that reproached me; then I could have borne it: neither was it he that hated me that did magnify himself against me; then I would have hid myself from him:

verses.name: Psalms 55:13
verses.text: But it was thou, a man mine equal, my guide, and mine acquaintance.

verses.name: Psalms 55:14
verses.text: We took sweet counsel together, and walked unto the house of God in company.

verses.name: Psalms 55:15
verses.text: Let death seize upon them, and let them go down quick into hell: for wickedness is in their dwellings, and among them.

verses.name: Psalms 55:16
verses.text: As for me, I will call upon God; and the Lord shall save me.
